name: sandbox-miami
description: Three.js sandbox hosted on Cloudflare Pages

scripts.dev: npm run build && python3 -m http.server --directory public 8000
scripts.dev:wrangler: npm run build && wrangler pages dev public
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy public
scripts.preview: npm run build && python3 -m http.server --directory public 8000

author: 0xkaos
